nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, disfigured, motion smear, motion artifacts, fused fingers, bad anatomy, weird hand, ugly

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values:
In the soft, golden light of late afternoon, a fox lady glides through an enchanted cartoon forest, her fur a brilliant auburn that seems to shimmer with an inner luminescence. She moves with ethereal grace, her long, elegant form draped in a flowing emerald cloak that billows and dances with each step. Her ears—pointed and alert—catch the subtle music of the woodland, while her nine tails trail behind her like a living, iridescent banner.
The forest around her pulses with storybook magic. Trees with impossibly curved trunks and leaves in every shade of green imaginable create a kaleidoscopic landscape. Cartoonish flowers bloom in oversaturated colors—deep purples, electric blues, and candy-apple reds—their petals seemingly drawn with bold, expressive brushstrokes. Mushrooms dot the landscape in perfect, whimsical circles, their caps gleaming like polished gemstones.
Soft, stylized light filters through the canopy, creating spotlights that dance across the forest floor. Sparkles drift through the air like living glitter, catching the light and spinning in delicate, choreographed patterns. Each step of the fox lady leaves a momentary trail of luminescent pawprints that fade with a gentle, magical shimmer.
Woodland creatures peek from behind stylized trees and oversized mushrooms—wide-eyed rabbits with impossibly round bodies, squirrels with exaggerated bushy tails, and birds with plumage that defies natural color schemes. They watch the fox lady with curiosity, their expressions drawn with the kind of emotional expressiveness found in the most enchanting animated films.
Her eyes—large and luminous, with a depth that suggests ancient wisdom—scan the forest. They reflect the world around her like living watercolors, capturing every nuance of light and movement. Her movements are both precise and fluid, each motion a dance between reality and imagination.
The forest floor is a tapestry of textures—soft moss that looks like it was carefully painted, winding roots that curl with cartoon-like exaggeration, and patches of ground that seem to breathe with a gentle, living quality. Streams of water wind through the landscape, their surfaces reflecting the world with a perfection that speaks of artistic intention rather than natural reflection.
As dusk approaches, the forest transforms. The colors deepen, becoming rich and saturated—deep indigos blending with warm oranges, creating a sunset that looks like it was crafted by the most skilled of animation artists. The fox lady continues her journey, a beacon of grace and mystery, her silhouette a perfect blend of natural form and fantastical design.
This is a world where magic isn't just possible—it's the very fabric of existence, and the fox lady is its most beautiful embodiment.

This model needs long descriptive prompts, if the prompt is too short the quality will suffer greatly.

https://blog.comfy.org/ltxv-day-1-comfyui/
